scripts.testnet-nft: truffle migrate --network testnet --f 3 --to 3 && truffle run verify NftFarm --network testnet
scripts.testnet: truffle migrate --network testnet --f 2 --to 2 && truffle run verify AfterLife MasterChefV2 --network testnet
scripts.testnet-vlad: truffle migrate --f 3 --to 3 --network testnet --reset && truffle run verify VladToken --network testnet
scripts.mainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify AfterLife MasterChefV2 --network mainnet
scripts.live: truffle migrate --network dev --f 3 --to 3 && nodemon --exec yarn test -e sol,js
